caption.p: Urine pH of rats ( n = 6) treated with the hydromethanolic extract and solvent fractions of the root bark of Clerodendrum myricoides. HME, hydromethanolic extract ( a400, b200, c100 mg/kg); AF, aqueous fraction ( a400, b200, c100 mg/kg); EAF, ethyl acetate fraction ( a400, b200, c100 mg/kg); CF, chloroform fraction ( a400, b200, c100 mg/kg); dF10, furosemide 10 mg/kg; eNC, normal control (either distilled water compared to HME and AF or 2% Tween 80 compared to EAF and CF). 1 P < 0.05; 2 P < 0.01; 3 P < 0.001.
